name: pulse
description: Pulse is a monitoring and management platform for Node.js applications running on PM2. Built with TanStack Start, Drizzle ORM, and PostgreSQL, it provides real-time insights into server health and process performance on your server. Designed for reliability and scalability, Pulse ensures optimal performance for applications like e-commerce platforms with features for monitoring, control, and alerting.
author: thecodingmontana
